name: Fire Truck Driver City Rescue
description:
Fire Truck Driver City Rescue is an addictive city rescue game which tests your skills to manage diversified conditions. You are on the mission to protect the city buildings.
Fire Truck Driver City Rescue is a multi-level game that emphasis on city rescue missions. You need to rescue different parts of the city that are on fire and you need to ride on the fire truck and take the role of fire extinguisher.
Fire Truck Driver City Rescue is the superb fire truck game. As an expert fire fighter your services are required in the city centre to deal with different situations. You are posted at the fire station and ready to deal with every emergency situation prevailing in the city.
You are needed to extinguish fire immediately and respond to the command. You are required to extinguish the fire blaze quite efficiently and vigilantly. So, the difficulty in the mission is to bother about the water level because water is the main factor to extinguish fire.
How to Play
Fire Truck Driver City Rescue is the multi-level addictive game can be played in the following way:
Tap play button choose level.
Choose Fire Extinguisher Mission.
Act according to mission statement.
Complete the mission using fire truck.
Features
Fire Truck Driver City Rescue is the game with multiple features.
Addictive game, multiple levels.
Real Fire Blaze Missions.
Sensational Fire Levels.
Real Fire rescue Game.
